cn.title: Name
cn.description: Arbitrary/Meaningful name of the Prefetch Rule

dicomAETitle.title: Archive AE title
dicomAETitle.description: AE Title of Archive Application Entity used for retrieving selected Studies from Prefetch C-Move SCP.

dcmPrefetchCFindSCP.title: Prefetch C-Find SCP
dcmPrefetchCFindSCP.description: AE Title of C-FIND SCP which is queried for Studies matching the specified Entity Selector.

dcmPrefetchCMoveSCP.title: Prefetch C-Move SCP
dcmPrefetchCMoveSCP.description: AE Title of C-MOVE SCP from which selected Studies are retrieved.

dcmPrefetchCStoreSCP.title: Prefetch C-Store SCP
dcmPrefetchCStoreSCP.description: AE Title of C-STORE SCP to which selected Studies are retrieved.

dcmEntitySelector.title: Entity Selector
dcmEntitySelector.description: Specifies matching keys used to select Studies to prefetch. Format: {key}={value}[&{key}={value)]..., with {key} = 'StudyAge' | {attributeID}. {value} in the format '$'{SEG}-{Seq#}[.{Comp#}[.{SubComp#}]] are replaced by the value of the specified HL7 field from the received HL7 message which triggered the prefetch. If no Entity Selector is specified, all Studies for the Patient will be pre-fetched. Example: 'StudyInstanceUID=$ZDS-1.1' => select the Study with the Study Instance UID from ZDS-1.1.

dcmNullifyIssuerOfPatientID.title: Ignore Assigning Authority of Patient ID
dcmNullifyIssuerOfPatientID.description: Conditionally ignore Assigning Authority of Patient ID (PID-3.4) in received HL7 message which triggered the prefetch for selecting Studies of the Patient.

dcmIssuerOfPatientID.title: Assigning Authority of Patient ID
dcmIssuerOfPatientID.description: Assigning Authority of Patient ID against values in received HL7 message are matched, if Assigning Authority of Patient ID is set to MATCHING or NOT_MATCHING. Format: <Issuer of Patient ID> [& <Universal Entity ID> & <Universal Entity ID Type>].

dcmDuration.title: Suppress Duplicate Retrieve Interval
dcmDuration.description: Suppress Retrieve of Studies already retrieved not earlier than the specified interval to avoid duplicate retrieves.

dcmSchedule.title: Prefetch Schedule
dcmSchedule.description: Delay prefetch to specified time periods. If no Prefetch Schedule is specified, queue a Prefetch Task for the selected Studies of the Patient immediately. Format: 'hour=[0-23] dayOfWeek=[0-6]' (0=Sunday)
